WITH Dim_Customer AS(
    select 
        CustomerID
        ,TRIM(ISNULL(Title,'')+ ' ' + ISNULL(FirstName,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(MiddleName,'') + ' ' + ISNULL(LastName,'') + ' ' +  ISNULL(Suffix,'')) as NameCustomer
        ,CompanyName
        ,SalesPerson
        ,EmailAddress
        ,Phone
        --,Title,FirstName , MiddleName ,LastName,  Suffix
        from SalesLT.Customer
)
,Dim_ProductCategory AS(
    select
    cat.ProductCategoryID as ProductCategoryKey
    ,cat.Name AS NameCategory
    ,ISNULL((select top 1 c1.Name from SalesLT.ProductCategory c1 where c1.ProductCategoryID = cat.ParentProductCategoryID),cat.Name) AS ParentCategory
    ,ModifiedDate
    from SalesLT.ProductCategory cat
)
,Dim_Product AS
(
    SELECT 
        ProductID as ProductKey
        ,TRIM(Name) as ProductName
        ,TRIM(ProductNumber) as SKUProduct
        ,TRIM(Color) as Color
        ,StandardCost as GeneralCost
        ,ListPrice as ListPrice
        ,ProductCategoryID as ProductCategoryKey
        ,SellStartDate as Start_Date
        ,SellEndDate as End_Date
        ,ISNULL(DiscontinuedDate,'9999-12-31') as DiscontinuedDate
        ,CASE WHEN SellEndDate IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsActive
    FROM SalesLT.Product
),
Fact_Sales AS (
select
soh.PurchaseOrderNumber as salesKey,
cus.CustomerID as CustomerKey,
convert(varchar,(DATEPART(YEAR,soh.OrderDate)))+''+CONVERT(char(2),CONVERT(char(8), soh.OrderDate, 101)) as DateKey,
/*soh.OrderDate as OrderDate,*/
soh.SalesOrderNumber,
pro.ProductKey,
sod.OrderQty as Quantity,
sod.UnitPrice as UnitPrice,
sod.UnitPriceDiscount as PriceDiscount,
soh.DueDate,
soh.ShipDate,
soh.Status,
soh.ShipMethod,
soh.subTotal,
soh.TaxAmt,
soh.Freight,
soh.TotalDue,
cus.*,
pro.ProductName,pro.SKUProduct,pro.Color,pro.Start_Date,pro.End_Date,pro.IsActive,
cat.*
    FROM SalesLT.SalesOrderHeader soh 
        INNER JOIN SalesLT.SalesOrderDetail sod on sod.SalesOrderID = soh.SalesOrderID
        INNER JOIN Dim_customer cus on cus.CustomerID = soh.CustomerID
        INNER JOIN Dim_Product pro on pro.ProductKey = sod.ProductID
        INNER JOIN Dim_ProductCategory cat on cat.ProductCategoryKey = pro.ProductCategoryKey
)
select * from Fact_Sales order by DateKey asc
